price: (82) And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لِي خَطِيٓـَٔتِي يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī aṭmaʿu an yaghfira lī khaṭīatī yawma al-dīni
